verse.name: v1

verse.lines: Trusting as the moments fly, Trusting as the days go by, Trusting Him, whateâ€™er befall, Trusting Jesus, that is all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Brightly doth His Spirit shine Into this poor heart of mine; While He leads I cannot fall, Trusting Jesus, that is all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Singing if my way be clear, Praying if the path be drear; If in danger, for Him call, Trusting Jesus, that is all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Trusting Him while life shall last, Trusting Him till earth is past, Till His gracious advent call, Trusting Jesus, that is all.
